org.assertj.swing.fixture.JPopupMenuFixture

Packages that use JPopupMenuFixture
org.assertj.swing.fixture Public API, source of FEST's power and flexibility. 
 

Uses of JPopupMenuFixture in org.assertj.swing.fixture
 

Methods in org.assertj.swing.fixture that return JPopupMenuFixture
 JPopupMenuFixture AbstractWindowFixture.showPopupMenu()
          Shows a pop-up menu using this fixture's Window as the invoker of the pop-up menu.

          Shows a pop-up menu using this fixture's item as the invoker of the pop-up menu.
